channel.title: DeltaScape Dragon Claw Special Download
channel.description:
Credits: 98% to Delta 1% to Da360tornado for dclaw stooof. 1% me
[i]This is Delta, all I did was added working dragon claws. I'm not going to supply you with the client models and ints.[/i]
http://uppit.com/I8PBGM

item.title: DeltaScape Dragon Claw Special Download
item.dc:creator: @1337JOEY 1337JOEY
item.description:
@1337JOEY wrote:

[quote=“smkscape, post:20, topic:262525”][quote author=tuner001 link=topic=346676.msg2686446#msg2686446 date=1235695401]
d claws are normally id: 8002 in delta servers (if they are added) but u need a client to that has them, anyways if u want to add them yourself:

tornado’s post:

OK,FINNALLY, HERE IS A 70% WORKING DRAGON CLAWS. HAS 4 HITS AND ANIMATION. FROM THERE IT SHOULD BE EASY TO FIX THE LITTLE BUGS IT HAS.

  1. search for this:

Code:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

should be directly near the top.

  1. now under that add:

Code:

public boolean DCDamg = false;
public int DCdown = 0;

3)now search for:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698

and should see something like this:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
startAnimation(0x426);
specialAtkNPC(false, 0, 252, 0x426);
getHit(25);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(0x426);
usingSpecial = true;
specialAmount -= 25;
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
}

  1. Now right under that add:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;
}

  1. now for the npcs, search this from where u added the code above:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698

u should see this:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426);
npcDamage(8);
}

under that add this:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}

  1. now search for:

Code:

public boolean process() {

under that add this:

Code:

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}
if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamg(25);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}

now you can save and compile.

  1. open your special.java and add thsi under:

Code:

case 5698:

you will have to search case 5698: 2 times because there are 2 of them.

now under both of the 2 cases 5698: add this:

Code:

case 8002:

save and compile and you are done.

70% credit to me for making the special
30% credit to special pk(Jvm Elite) who tested and nipped the code here and there.

[/quote]
Here are the bugs. Fixed:

  1. search for this:

Code:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

should be directly near the top.

  1. now under that add:

Code:

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCdown = 0;

3)now search for:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698

and should see something like this:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ startAnimation(0x426); specialAtkNPC(false, 0, 252, 0x426); getHit(25); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; startAnimation(0x426); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 25; int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; }

  1. Now right under that add:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 50, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; }

  1. now for the npcs, search this from where u added the code above:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698

u should see this:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); }

under that add this:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

  1. now search for:

Code:

public boolean process() {

under that add this:

Code:

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } } if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

now you can save and compile.

  1. open your special.java and add thsi under:

Code:

case 5698:

you will have to search case 5698: 2 times because there are 2 of them.

now under both of the 2 cases 5698: add this:

Code:

case 8002:

save and compile and you are done.

under that add this:

now you can save and compile.

now under both of the 2 cases 5698: add this:
